column1: Complete level 10 in Story Mode to unlock Marathon Mode!

column1: Tap to rotate. Drag to move. Flick down to drop.
column2: Tap to rotate. Drag to move. Flick down to drop.

column1: Drag to move the shape. Release to drop.
column2: Drag to move the Tetrimino. Release to drop.

column1: Move the shape with your mouse. Left-click to drop.
column2: Aim your mouse to position the Tetrimino. Left-click to drop it in place.

column1: Well done! Make one more Line Clear to complete the level.
column2: Reach the Line Clears goal to complete this level!

column1: Tap Hold to save the current shape. Tap Hold again to switch it with another.
column2: Tap Hold to save the current Tetrimino.

column1: Click Hold to save the current shape. Click Hold again to switch it with another.
column2: Click Hold to save the current Tetrimino.

column1: When this number reaches zero, all blocks in the level are shuffled
column2: When this number reaches zero, all the Blocks will be shuffled.

column1: When this number reaches zero, gravity reverses and the shapes drop in the opposite direction
column2: When this number reaches zero, gravity reverses and new Tetriminos will drop in the opposite direction.

column1: Use Score Cells to earn more points.
column2: Include Score Cells in Line Clears for extra score. Use this to earn more stars!

column1: Complete the level before time runs out.
column2: Complete the level before time runs out.

When this number reaches zero, grey Blocks will spawn up from the bottom.
Double, Triple and Tetris Line Clears give higher score. Use this to earn more stars!
Complete each level by reaching the Line Clears goal.
Use the arrow keys to position the Tetrimino. Press spacebar to drop it in place.

Press Shift or C to Hold the current Tetrimino.
Watch a video to remove half of all the Blocks in the level, and continue playing!
• If you go game over, watch   a video to continue playing!
Stars earned in Marathon Mode are added to your total to unlock new levels on the map!
